quest.name: Facing Your Demons
journal: Guildmaster Cocobuki wishes to enlist your aid in tracking down Cocobusi.
Cocobusi has been spotted in the vicinity of Vesper Bay. Take the descriptions that Cocobuki has written of the voidsent-possessed Lalafell, and hand them out to a few Vesper Bay locals.

Your investigations have revealed that Cocobusi is in the company of a marauder and a thaumaturge. You also learn that the succubus was seen leaving a local alehouse with several smitten maidens. Report your findings to Cocobuki, who is waiting at the center of Vesper Bay.

After explaining Mormo's grim purpose for the women she has seduced, Cocobuki bids you seek out the Lominsan adventurers said to be accompanying the treacherous voidsent. Begin your search to the north of Vesper Bay.
You have stumbled across one of the missing adventurers, and defeated an imp's attempted ambush. Speak with the wounded marauder to find out where Cocobusi may be heading.

You learn from the marauder that his thaumaturge companion has been dragged further north, into the caverns of Moondrip. Locate Cocobuki directly outside the cave, and speak with him when you are ready to put an end to the voidsent's murderous villainy.
With the aid of the four fearful yet determined brothers, you have succeeded in defeating the terrible Mormo. Return to the Thaumaturges' Guild and speak with Cocobuki.

Cocobuki attributes his family's renewed perspective on their sorcerous discipline to your valiant and masterful displays of magecraft. It is with great eagerness that the emboldened guildmaster awaits tales of your future endeavors in thaumaturgy.
objectives: Hand out Cocobusi reports to Vesper Bay locals.
Speak with Cocobuki at the Thaumaturges' Guild.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Hm hm hm... Fortune has favored us, Forename: Cocobusi has been spotted at Vesper Bay.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: We cannot let this opportunity pass us by! Head there with all due haste. And with you, take these descriptions of my brother's likeness and Mormo's mannerisms. Relay this information to some of the local residents and see what you can find.

dialogue.name: MOBA
dialogue.text: Hm? Somethin' I can do for you, stranger?

dialogue.name: MOBA
dialogue.text: Now that you mention it, I did see a Lalafell who matches this description. He was watchin' the ferries come in with more than a passin' interest. Lookin' to hire some adventurers or some such, I reckon.

dialogue.name: MOBB
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Pissed Peiste, love! What can I get ye?

dialogue.name: MOBB
dialogue.text: Ah, information, is it? Aye, that little bloke was in here, bringin' a blush to all the young maidens' cheeks. What he lacked in height, he certainly made up for in boldness! Left with more than one lass on his arm, he did.

dialogue.name: MOBC
dialogue.text: What's that, missson? You say you're looking for someone?

dialogue.name: MOBC
dialogue.text: Hmmm. I believe I saw your Lalafell in the company of a couple adventurers hailing from Limsa Lominsa─a marauder and a thaumaturge, were I to hazard a guess. I think they were talking about seeing the area north of here...

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I have enlisted the assistance of my brothers in questioning the locals, but I fear they are unsuited to such subtle endeavors. Our plans rest upon your efforts, Forename.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Hm hm hm... So, Mormo has chosen this as her new hunting ground.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: The maidens seduced by the succubus will be prepared as vessels to hold her fully restored power; I fear they will have already been slain. As for the adventurers, well, I think you can imagine what Mormo intends for the thaumaturge.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: We must find and warn those unwitting Lominsans before the voidsent strikes again. You were told that they might be headed north, yes? It would be best for you to follow suit.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Pray do not wait on me, Forename. I must gather my brothers before doing aught else. Hurry northward and warn those unsuspecting Lominsans of the danger.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!

dialogue.name: ADV
dialogue.text: <groan> Still here... It's still here...somewhere close...

dialogue.name: ADV
dialogue.text: Me thanks, lasslad. Ugh, me head... That little bastard said he would give us the grand tour of Ul'dah.

dialogue.name: ADV
dialogue.text: <cough> Aye, it's been grand, all right. Please... He took me mate further north. Think he was mutterin' somethin' 'bout Moondrip.

dialogue.name: COCOBANI
dialogue.text: Forename! What has befallen!?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I sensed the presence of voidsent, but it appears you have things well in hand.

dialogue.name: COCOBYGO
dialogue.text: <shudder> Mormo is in Moondrip...? A fitting place for the battle to come.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: It is time to finish this, my brothers─Cocobusi will be a slave to that fiend no longer.

dialogue.name: SCENE00020
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“A Feast of Aether”?

dialogue.name: SCENE00020
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: SCENE00020
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I shall approach Mormo first, as we discussed. If the bargaining proceeds smoothly, and the voidsent feasts on my proffered mana, then she should soon manifest in her demonic form.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Once Mormo is fully present within this realm, that is when you unleash the seething power of the abyss!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: ...Though after lecturing for so long on how a thaumaturge should avoid such threats, I yet hold doubts as to whether such a direct conflict is the correct path.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Forename, in your experience, what do you consider to be a thaumaturge's greatest strength?

dialogue.name: Q
dialogue.text: What is a thaumaturge's greatest strength?

dialogue.name: A
dialogue.text: Overwhelming destructive might!

dialogue.name: A
dialogue.text: ...Introspection.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Yes, there are none who can match our propensity for fiery ruin. We need not run from danger, but rather employ our unrivaled powers to incinerate all that seek to do us harm.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Hm hm hm... Yes, indeed, it is perhaps only by looking within that we may find the answers we seek.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I am decided. My fate awaits me. I have faith that, no matter what becomes of me, you shall succeed in destroying Mormo, ending her threat to this realm.

dialogue.name: COCOBYGO
dialogue.text: <twitch> The big battle at last, eh? It really is quite thrilling! ...Really!

dialogue.name: COCOBANI
dialogue.text: Are you ready? You seem ready. I stand ready! Well...I stand, anyway. <groan> I think I may have overindulged in ether before we left...

dialogue.name: COCOBEZI
dialogue.text: M-Me? Perfectly fine! S-Solid as an adamantoise!

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Bwaha...ha... <sigh> Is it normal to be this nervous?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Enough, Mormo!

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Well, well. If it isn't the eldest of the COWARDLY thaumaturge brothers. I thought you'd be busy whimpering under your bed, wishing that I'd just DISAPPEAR.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I've come to offer you a deal. I know you seek the aetheric energy needed to substantiate your true form...but how much time do you intend to waste, feeding on these lesser mages?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Compared to these stripling sorcerers and their trembling arcane flames, my power is as a blazing sun. Would you not prefer to take what I can give you?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Drain my strength, and assume your rightful appearance. I am sure you think me a coward, but that is of no consequence. I only wish Cocobusi returned to us unharmed.

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Hee hee hee! You are WISE to acquiesce, mage!

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Hee hee hee! At LAST! At long last, my true body─my true POWER─is mine once more! I believe a stretching of the old arcane muscles is in order...

dialogue.name: COCOBYGO
dialogue.text: Oh! Oh no you don't, v-voidsent!

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: We won't let you leave here alive!

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Hee hee hee! So, you risk your LIVES in a valiant rescue attempt? You should not bet what you are not prepared to LOSE! I shall tear the aether from your very MARROW!

dialogue.name: COCOBYGO
dialogue.text: ...We won?

dialogue.name: COCOBANI
dialogue.text: We won! Victory is ours! Cocobusi! Cocobuki! Mormo is dead!

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: <groan> What...? Where am I?

dialogue.name: COCOBUBEZI
dialogue.text: Thank Thal, you're awake. Cocobuki! Cocobusi is returned to us!

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Our...our sibling has yet to stir from his somnolent stupor.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Buki!?

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: His aetheric channels have contracted─they are barely sufficient to sustain the flow of his life force. If we do not increase his capacity for aether soon, his vitality will drain away completely.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: ...My mana-amplifying potion. Its potency is limited, but it just might be enough!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I see the battle ended...as I expected...

dialogue.name: COCOBYGO
dialogue.text: Y-You did it, Cocobusi! Your alchemy saved him!

dialogue.name: COCOBYGO
dialogue.text: And we would not have prevailed without you, Forename! We will bear our brother back to the Ossuary─pray meet us there that we might properly express our gratitude!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. After seeking refuge in the comforting shadows of the abyss for so long, I had lost sight of the blazing glory of which thaumaturgy is capable.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: The raw power and audacity of your magecraft has freed my brothers and me from our self-imposed cowardice.

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: I thought Thal Himself had His fingers at my throat... But this sensation of hard-won supremacy is strangely satisfying!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: As for you, Cocobusi: you are our brother, and our respected colleague. I hope you never again underestimate the precious power you wield.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Forename, you have exceeded all my expectations. In recognition of your outstanding growth as a thaumaturge, I shall impart to you one of the guild's most closely guarded techniques:

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Manaward. It is a defensive weaving of energies that blunts the force of any attack made against you.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Hm hm hm... I am sure you can understand why we do not teach this secret to every stray hedge wizard who chooses to join our ranks.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Now that you have experienced the deadliest threats─and the joy that comes with their obliteration─I am certain you are eager to explore just how deep you might descend into the chasm of thaumaturgy.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: May your struggles bring wisdom, and your wisdom bring courage. I, for one, look forward to hearing of your future thaumaturgical endeavors. Hm hm hm...

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: Mwahahaha! Your screams are my SUSTENANCE!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
<tremble> I-I will keep Mormo focused on me!
Stay well back!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: I-I shall lend Cocobygo my support!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: M-My thaumaturgy will rend the very air!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: F-Frightened? Hah! I fry fiends for fun!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
Hee hee! It's all coming back to me.
Why don't you come a little CLOSER!?

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: What in the name of the gods was that!?

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
Intimacy!
She weaves our threats as spells!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
My spells were silenced...
But we must muster our magicks!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
L-Let's all keep calm, now!
She seeks to perplex and confound us!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
Resilient little NUISANCES!
The stones will drink your BLOOD!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: She conjures minions from the void!

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: Her sorcery is...too terrible...

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: Too many ethers...not enough potions...

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text: I am overmatched...and overmagicked...

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
Bwa...haha... <cough>
Defeat is decidedly distasteful...

dialogue.name: BATTLETALK
dialogue.text:
No! For CENTURIES, I dreamed of escape!
I will not be...denied...
